name: Majokko Daisakusen: Little Witching Mischiefs
overview: Little Witching Mischiefs is a tactical RPG that features a scenario mode, a story mode and a gallery mode that will be unlocked when the player advance through the story mode. The game features 7 different characters in the story mode for the player to choose one of them. And the story is divided into different missions (called maps in the game) and will advance when the player complete each mission. Before each mission the player can choose the party that will fight with his character (there are 7 characters and he can choose 4 of them but using the mana the player can bring more units to the battle field). In some parts of the battle field the player can reach some mini games, if the player complete the mini game successfully he will gain experience that will help him to level up his characters. The fights are also action and the player have to control the character and defeat the enemies.
